info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 3:10AM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Chippewa and southeastern Mackinac Counties through 415 AM EDT... At 310 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Evergreen Shores, or near St. Ignace, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... St. Ignace, Mackinaw City and Evergreen Shores around 315 AM EDT. Straits State Park around 320 AM EDT. Mackinac Island around 325 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Point Aux Pins On. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
